name: Singularity Clicker: The Birth of Infinity
name_original: Singularity Clicker: The Birth of Infinity
description:
Singularity Clicker: Birth of Infinity Introduction

Singularity Clicker is a Simple Clicker Game and a tale 

of the reason behind the birth of Infinity. 

There is a special end to this game. 

This game is made with Neptune.js Framework.

Game Jam?

This game is a submission to the Floppy Disk Jam,

 and is made within the limits and theme of jam. Check out the Jam and other submissions as well.

Like the Game?

If you like the game make sure you leave your feedback.

And do rate the game for the jam.

Let me know how far you have made or your time if you manage to complete the game :)

Thank You! ❤
